content: around next st *double_crochet into the next 3 sts double_crochet into & fpdc around next st* repeat from * to * 2x *double_crochet into next 3 sts fpdc around next st **double_crochet into the next 3 sts double_crochet & fpdc around next st** repeat from ** to ** 2x * repeat from * to * 3x slip_stitch to beginning ch3 to join 56 sts round 6 chain 1 & single_crochet into same st single_crochet into next 2 sts fphdc around next st half_double_crochet into next double_crochet into next 2 sts treble_crochet into next *2tr-ch2-2tr into next st treble_crochet into next double_crochet into next 2 sts half_double_crochet into next fphdc around next st single_crochet into next 3 sts fphdc around next st half_double_crochet into next double_crochet into next 2 sts treble_crochet into next* repeat from * to * 3x 2tr-ch2-2tr into next st treble_crochet into next double_crochet into next 2 sts half_double_crochet into next fphdc around next st slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 68 sts round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet into next 2 sts fphdc around next st half_double_crochet into next 6 sts *2hdc-ch2-2hdc into chsp half_double_crochet into next 6 sts fphdc around next st half_double_crochet into next 3 sts fphdc around next st half_double_crochet into next 6 sts* repeat from * to * 3x 2hdc-ch2-2hdc into chsp half_double_crochet into next 6 sts fphdc around next st slip_stitch into beginning ch2 to join 84 sts 3 round 8 ch1 and single_crochet into same st single_crochet into the next 11 sts *3 single_crochet into chsp single_crochet into next 21 sts* repeat from * to * 3x 3 single_crochet into chsp single_crochet into the next 9 sts join and fo 96 sts recommended resources bella coco has a tutorial on making a magic_ring or magic_ring https //youtu be/j7ghtfxaz2e crystalsandcrochet has a tutorial on youtube about how to make standing stitches https //youtu be/wy0me0npuog also a tutorial on invisible joins for chain and standing stitches to prevent lumpy spots and lessen seam lines on your project https //youtu be/vovi8duekqw 4
